text: Twennynine with Lenny White is the second album of American R&B; band Twennynine, released in November 1980 on Elektra Records. The album reached No. 22 on the Billboard Top R&B; Albums chart. ==Overview== Twennynine with Lenny White was produced by Lenny White and Larry Dunn. ==Singles== As a single Kid Stuff rose to No. 19 on the Billboard Hot Soul Songs chart. Fancy Dancer also reached No. 17 on the Billboard Dance Club Songs chart and No. 25 on the Billboard Hot Soul Songs chart. ==Tracklisting== ==References== Category:1980 albums Category: Elektra Records albums
title: Twennynine with Lenny White (album)
